named-query.name: getPartColorsByPartId
named-query.query: select pc from PartColorEntity pc where pc.part.id = :partId order by pc.number

named-query.name: getPartColorsByPartIds
named-query.query: select pc from PartColorEntity pc where pc.part.id in (:partIds) order by pc.part.id, pc.number

named-query.name: getPartColorsByPartIdAndEqualsSearch
named-query.query: select pc from PartColorEntity pc where pc.part.id = :partId and lower(pc.color.name) = lower(:search) order by pc.number

named-query.name: getPartColorsByPartIdAndNotEqualsSearch
named-query.query: select pc from PartColorEntity pc where pc.part.id = :partId and lower(pc.color.name) like '%' || lower(:search) || '%' order by pc.number

named-query.name: getPartColorCountByNumber
named-query.query: select count(pc.id) from PartColorEntity pc where lower(pc.number) = lower(:number) or lower(pc.alternateNumber) like '%' || lower(:number) || '%'

named-query.name: getPartColorByNumber
named-query.query: select pc from PartColorEntity pc where lower(pc.number) = lower(:number) or lower(pc.alternateNumber) like '%' || lower(:number) || '%'

named-query.name: getPartColorByNumberPartNumber
named-query.query: select pc from PartColorEntity pc join pc.part p where (lower(pc.number) = lower(:number) or lower(pc.alternateNumber) like '%' || lower(:number) || '%')and lower(p.number) = lower(:partNumber)

named-query.name: getPartColorByPartAndColor
named-query.query: select pc from PartColorEntity pc where pc.part.id = :partId and pc.color.id = :colorId
